title: OpenClaw Defect Report
description: Schema for reporting a systemic defect via the OpenClaw framework.

defect_id.description: Unique identifier for the defect report.

reporter.description: Name or identifier of the party reporting the defect.

target_system.description: The system or entity the defect pertains to.

date_logged.description: ISO 8601 date when the defect was logged (e.g. 2026-02-24).
